name: closefriend
text: A comment left by closefriend was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by patkun, johnnybaverage, apocowarg, heccibiggs, Jesler729, shutup_shutup, goocifer, chivalress, StagnantDisplay, Bourbonsamurai, atypicaloracle, RedMange, Ebessan, a-jay, gorrioncita, Boredom_Man, scraggg, Doc_Rostov, hausea, Appers)

name: boredom_man
text: Closeted gays like being raped! Totally authentic footage!

name: karljw
text:
THE best possible way to answer the above comment. this is something like the 5th variation on the incredibly idiotic and quasi-homophobic anti-logic that assumes that Pat, being in the closet, must "subconsciously" enjoy any homosexual act that is perpetrated on his person, with or without his consent.

Fortunately, Acheworld almost always immediately redeems itself with comments similar to yours, invariably with chubbies in the double digits.

name: tragicone
text: look, this is like saying that a straight man would not enjoy being sexually assaulted by a woman he may find attractive. Women have different feels about rape than men do, and to disagree would only be you trying to further this dialogue in vain.

name: sustainability
text: OK! I will not dialogue with you in vain.

name: dusty
text: Who say's he would find beef attractive. I definitely would not enjoy it if a nerdy female friend of mine forced me to do oral on her. Ok, now that I wrote that out and read it back, yes I would.

name: afrothunder
text: You assume that the woman would be raping you with traditional sex, but if she is attractive and still has to rape you it probably involves something you would not enjoy, like a strap on and your anus.

name: gorrioncita
text: why do you think 22 people chubbied this comment? are they just being contentious?  or ironic?

name: mangtastic
text: There are 23 people confused about homosexuality.

name: dissembly
text: YouTube closed up for the night, and there was a sudden rush of 12-year olds and creeps into the Asset-Bar.

name: petitegitan
text: When you read this you wonder: "Would I be an accessory to murder for a Hickory Farms Executive Sampler?"  Sadly, I believe most of us would respond, resoundingly, "Yes."

name: mastronaut
text:
The sausages and cheeses and fancy mustard and those little strawberry candies.

I would be an accessory to murder for strawberry candies.

name: highpitch_83
text: A comment left by highpitch_83 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by orvel, lesange, unkle_bob, Fcannon)

name: dorothypoopbot
text: The murder of your best friend, no less. Oh, how I wish I had the strength to resist those sumptuous meats.

name: shinkusan
text:
Seriously, who's mind was blown when the alt text said "click here for a summer sausage sensation" and then, if you DO click there (without assetbar), it ACTUALLY REDIRECTS YOU TO THE HICKORY FARMS WEBSITE.

That almost blew my mind as much as when somebody told me since pro is the opposite of con, therefore congress is the opposite of progress.

name: dissembly
text: Ray wouldn't do it on Pat's say-so, but he might think about talking Roast Beef into taking a dive for him if the situation actually arose. Beef would also be well-compensated upon his return from hospital/hell.

name: whuppins
text: I just now realized that Pat has tried to borrow Ray's gun on two separate occasions.

name: riazm
text: He won't buy his own gun because he is cheap

name: zapatos
text: He is a felon, the background check would never pass.  Oh unless he were to shop via blackmarket, and that is expense.  I see your point.

name: dougthehead
text: Yeah, Pat's doesn't want to see himself as one of those uncivilized gun nuts that go around with their NRA stickers on their car, but he still likes to shoot the occasional person.  So he borrows Ray's.

name: atypicaloracle
text: In such a way as normal NRA people do not actually go around shooting people. Plus buying a gun on the black market would force Pat to associate with people who he will see as being of low mind.

name: mortshire
text: His pepper is touching the rim.

name: lizjones
text: Another glimpse of Ray's buttcrack.

name: connellingus
text: It's more likely the top part of his tail. His buttcrack would be underneath it.

name: aparrish
text:
Are you really trying to make statements about the anatomy of cats in Achewood using reason

Are you

name: greenkoolayd
text: cats dont have buttcracks, you dumbass!

name: mangtastic
text:
Cats also don't have telephones or a secret underground society and they sure aren't bipedal.

What I'm saying is, maybe you shouldn't be so harsh dude. Just sayin'.

name: greenkoolayd
text: it was faux-harshness, you dumbass!

name: greymantledwolf
text: this comic puts a point on a couple people i know, lend me [something] even though there is no [reward], and in fact a [detriment] for you

name: ezcmac
text: Ray needs to get a thong which more appropriately accommodates his tail. That just doesn't look comfortable enough for the king of R & R.

name: riazm
text: In some strips he has a thong with a hole for his tail.

name: deancain29
text: in the last panel he is wearing a towel - what the hell?

name: riazm
text: You don't put wet junk in a dry thong dude.

name: deancain29
text: you're right - I think the same thing when I am in that situation, yet I didnt translate it to the strip!

name: bixschmix
text: Keeps the junk funk away.

name: stuart
text: Scroll down for a link to the blog (props to xiaomimi)

name: steerpike66
text: Brushing and urinating at once is unhygenic but it's sort of a challenge; that's why you feel you have to do it. Anyway, nobody said you have to change hands mid-way.

name: connellingus
text: The added challenge here is that he does it with the seat down.

name: darqhermit
text: And apparently Ray has no toilet seat cover. It takes up too much time.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: challenge schmallenge, get in the shower and get three things done at once.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Ray is hands-free in the strip - Mortshire is probably right.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by TTAGXAMM, cailetshadow, Darthemed)

name: ezcmac
text: I am clicking here but I have not received a summer sausage sensation.

name: luckypyjamas
text: a five for the summer sausage sensation

name: soticoto
text: Alt-Text FTW.

name: baryonyx
text:
"You want me to break the law in order to help you shoot my best friend."

In context, this is one of my favorite lines in all of Achewood.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs

Ray: Good news! I ain't got junk funk.

Today's Blogs

Teodor: Is Thom Yorke a douchebag?
Mr. Bear: Greetings from...home.
Lyle: glenladdie tour says 2 ingreds to scotch

name: chachibenji
text:
I want to know badly what the BZZZZZZ sound is coming from.
I do not BZZZZZZZZ when I make urination or brush my teeth. :(

name: heccibiggs
text: Electric toothbrush. Doy.

name: chachibenji
text: Oh unecessary touch of the rude. I was genuinely curious.

name: greenkoolayd
text: need a tissue for your issue?

name: goatmasterflash
text: Nah. Toothbrush was confirmed as going "brush" "brush" in panel two. Try electric razor. Doy.

name: nyu
text: The first two panels are how cell phones die and facebook groups get started.

name: heccibiggs
text: Haaaaa. I'm assuming this as the explanation for every "I lost my phone! Numbers please!" group I see, from now on until the rest of forever.

name: diggidy
text:
Listen Pat, the last time you shot Beef you wound up living with Nice Pete.

Do you really want to walk down that road again?

name: desert_donkey
text: A comment left by desert_donkey was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Norsef, apocowarg, heccibiggs, Mangtastic, thing)

name: desert_donkey
text: A comment left by desert_donkey was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Norsef, apocowarg, heccibiggs, Mangtastic, thing)

name: heccibiggs
text: Thanks for commenting twice so I could lame you twice.

name: zem
text: you're welcome!

name: unkle_bob
text: I love that Pat has to say 'listen to me!' right after identifying himself on the phone. He has had too many unsuccessful phone calls because people stop listening after 'this is pat.'

name: milo
text: this calls into question just how many times before Pat has tried to borrow Ray's gun...

name: milo
text: apart from the times shown in the comic, obviously
